00015 /**

00017  * @package kata_controller
00018  */

00020     /**
00021      * which models to use. Array of Modelnames in CamelCase, eg. array('User','Ship')
00022      * 
00023      * @var array
00024      */
00025     public $uses = array ();

00027     /**
00028      * which helpers to use inside the view. Array of Helpernames in CamelCase, eg. array('Js','My'). html is always included.
00029      *  
00030      * @var array
00031      */
00032     public $helpers = array (
00033         'html'
00034     );

00037      * which components to use. Array of componentnames in CamelCase, eg. array('Locale','Session')

00046      *

00052      * which layout to use. null means an empty layout, otherwise kata will look for views/layouts/default.thtml

00141     /**
00142      * constructor. builds an array of all models, components and helpers this controller (including the ones of the appController) needs.
00143      */
00144     function __construct() {
00145         if (substr(get_class($this), -10) != 'Controller') {
00146             throw new InvalidArgumentException('controller::__construct my classname does not end with "Controller"');
00147         }
00148 
00149         if (is_subclass_of($this, 'AppController')) {
00150             $appVars = get_class_vars('AppController');
00151             $this->view = $appVars['view'];
00152             $uses = $appVars['uses'];
00153             $merge = array (
00154                 'components',
00155                 'helpers'
00156             );
00157 
00158             if (!empty ($this->uses) && ($uses == $this->uses)) {
00159                 //array_unshift($this->uses, $this->modelClass);
00160             }
00161             elseif (!empty ($this->uses)) {
00162                 $merge[] = 'uses';
00163             }
00164 
00165             foreach ($merge as $var) {
00166                 if (isset ($appVars[$var]) && !empty ($appVars[$var]) && is_array($this-> {
00167                     $var })) {
00168                     $this-> {
00169                         $var }
00170                     = array_merge($this-> {
00171                         $var }, array_diff($appVars[$var], $this-> {
00172                         $var }));
00173                 }
00174             }
00175         }
00176     }

00190             echo "setting $name to $value";

00194     /**
00195      * loads all models this controller needs
00196      */
00197     function _constructClasses() {
00198         if (!is_array($this->uses)) {
00199             throw new InvalidArgumentException('$uses must be an array');
00200         }
00201         require_once LIB.'model.php';
00202         foreach ($this->uses as $u) {
00203             $this-> $u = getModel($u);
00204         }
00205         $this->_constructComponents($this);
00206     }
00207 
00208     /**
00209      * loads all components this controller needs, even late
00210      */
00211     function _constructComponents() {
00212             if (!is_array($this->components)) {
00213                 throw new InvalidArgumentException('$components must be an array');
00214             }
00215             foreach ($this->components as $comname) {
00216                 $classname = $comname . 'Component';
00217                 if (!isset($this->$comname)) {
00218                     $this-> $comname = classRegistry :: getObject($classname);
00219                     $this-> $comname->startup($this);
00220                 }
00221             }
00222     }

00224     /**
00225      * call the actual action of this controller and render it
00226      */
00227     function dispatch() {
00228         try {
00229             call_user_func_array(array (
00230                 $this,
00231                 $this->params['action']
00232             ), $this->params['pass']);
00233         } catch (Exception $e) {
00234             $this->afterError($e);
00235         }
00236     }

00238     /**
00239      * render the given view with the given layout and put the result in the output-property of this controller. this just calls renderView which does the real work.
00240      * 
00241      * @param string $action name of the view (without .thtml) to render
00242      * @param string $layout optional: name of the layout(-view) to render the view into. if false the default layout of this controller is taken
00243      */
00244     function render($action, $layout = false) {
00245         $this->output = $this->renderView($action, $layout);
00246     }
00247 
00248     /**
00249      * include and instanciate view-class
00250      */
00251     protected function initViewClass() {
00252         if ($this->viewClass === null) {
00253             $viewClassName = $this->view;
00254             require LIB.strtolower($viewClassName).'.php';
00255             $this->viewClass = new $viewClassName ($this);
00256         }
00257     }
00258 
00259     /**
00260      * render the given view with the given layout and put the result in the output-property of this controller.
00261      * 
00262      * @param string $action name of the view (without .php) to render
00263      * @param string $layout optional: name of the layout(-view) to render the view into. if false the default layout of this controller is taken
00264      */
00265     function & renderView($action, $layout = null) {
00266         $this->initViewClass();
00267 
00268         $this->autoRender = false;
00269         $this->beforeFilter();
00270         if ($layout === false) {
00271             $layout = $this->layout;
00272         }
00273         $html = $this->viewClass->render($action, $layout);
00274         $this->afterFilter();
00275 
00276         return $html;
00277     }
00278 
00279     /**
00280      * render the given view with the given layout and put the result in the output-property of this controller.
00281      * 
00282      * @param string $html raw html
00283      * @param string $layout optional: name of the layout(-view) to render the view into. if false the default layout of this controller is taken
00284      */
00285     function & renderCachedHtml($html, $layout = null) {
00286         $this->initViewClass();
00287 
00288         if ($layout === false) {
00289             $layout = $this->layout;
00290         }
00291         $this->autoRender = false;
00292         // call no before/afterFilter because the whole view is cached and needs no data
00293 
00294         $html = $this->viewClass->renderLayout($html, $layout);
00295         return $html;
00296     }
00297 
00298     /**
00299      * redirect to the given url. if relative the base-url to the framework is automatically added.
00300      * 
00301      * @param string $url to redirect to
00302      * @param int $status http status-code to use for redirection (default 303=get the new url via GET even if this page was reached via POST)
00303      * @param bool $die if we should die() after redirect (default: true);
00304      */
00305     function redirect($url, $status = null, $die = true) {
00306         if (!is_numeric($status) || ($status < 100) || ($status > 505)) {
00307             $status = 303;
00308         }
00309 
00310         $this->autoRender = false;
00311         if (function_exists('session_write_close')) {
00312             session_write_close();
00313         }
00314 
00315         $pos = strpos($url, '://');
00316         if ($pos === false) { // is relative url, construct rest
00317             $url = $this->base . $url;
00318         }
00319 
00320         header('HTTP/1.1 ' . $status);
00321         header('Location: ' . $url);
00322         if ($die) {
00323             if ((DEBUG < 1) && headers_sent()) {
00324                 echo '<html><head><title>Redirect</title>' .
00325                 '<meta http-equiv="refresh" content="1; url=' . $url . '">' .
00326                 '<meta name="robots" content="noindex" /><meta http-equiv="cache-control" content="no-cache" /><meta http-equiv="pragma" content="no-cache" />' .
00327                 '</head>' .
00328                 '<body>Redirect to <a href="' . $url . '">' . $url . '</a></body>' .
00329                 '<script type="text/javascript">window.setTimeout(\'document.location.href="' . $url . '";\',1100);</script>';
00330                 '</html>';
00331             }
00332             die;
00333         }
00334     }

00354     /**
00355      * set a variable to be available inside the view. the given name-string is the name of the global variable inside the view ('bla' => $bla)
00356      * 
00357      * @param string $name name of the variable that should be globally accessible inside the view
00358      * @param mixed $value contents of the variable
00359      **/
00360     function set($name, $value = null) {
00361         if ($name == 'title') {
00362             $this->setPageTitle($value);
00363         } else {
00364             $this->viewVars[$name] = $value;
00365         }
00366     }
00367 
00368     /**
00369      * like set, but assignes the variable by reference
00370      * 
00371      * @param string $name name of the variable that should be globally accessible inside the view
00372      * @param mixed $value contents of the variable
00373      */
00374     function setRef($name, & $value) {
00375         if ($name == 'title') {
00376             $this->setPageTitle($value);
00377         } else {
00378             $this->viewVars[$name] = $value;
00379         }
00380     }
00381 
00382     /**
00383      * Get a variable that's available inside the view.
00384      * The given name-string is the name of the global variable
00385      * inside the view.
00386      *
00387      * @param string $name name of the variable
00388      * @return mixed
00389      */
00390     function get($name) {
00391         if ($name == 'title') {
00392             return $this->getPageTitle();
00393         }
00394         if (isset ($this->viewVars[$name])) {
00395             return $this->viewVars[$name];
00396         }
00397         return null;
00398     }

00400     /**
00401      * late-add a helper, just for this view. use if you dont want to add an 
00402      * helper via $helpers because only 1 view uses the helper
00403      * 
00404      * @param string $name name of the helper ('Form')
00405      */
00406     function addHelper($name) {
00407         if (!in_array($name, $this->helpers)) {
00408             $this->helpers[] = $name;
00409         }
00410     }
00411 
00412     /**
00413      * late-load a component
00414      * @param string $name name of the component to add (without 'Component')
00415      */
00416     function addComponent($name) {
00417         if (!in_array($name,$this->components)) {
00418             $this->components[] = $name;
00419             $this->_constructComponents();
00420         }
00421     }

00460     /**
00461      * renders 404-layout if you return true. you can also call+render a different action if you like

00463      */
00464     function before404() {

00468     /**
00469     * default exception handler. if you dont overwrite it just rethrows the exception 
00470     * @param object $exception previously occured exception
00471     */
00472     function afterError($exception) {
00473         throw $exception;
00474     }

00476     /**
00477      * translate get/post or url/form to string suiteable for $this->params
00478      * @access private
00479      */
00480     private function normalizeMethod($method) {
00481         $method = strtoupper($method);
00482         if (($method == 'GET') || ($method == 'URL')) {
00483             return 'url';
00484         }
00485         if (($method == 'POST') || ($method == 'FORM')) {
00486             return 'form';
00487         }
00488         throw new InvalidArgumentException("'method' can only be 'get' or 'post'");
00489     }
00490 
00491     /**
00492      * validate form-helper results, against model if needed
00493      * 
00494      * @param array $fields key(inputname)-value(validationparam) array of form-variables to validate
00495      * @return bool true if everything validated successful
00496      */
00497     function validate($method, $how) {
00498         $method = $this->normalizeMethod($method);
00499         if (empty ($this->params[$method])) {
00500             return array ();
00501         }
00502 
00503         $validateUtil = getUtil('Validate');
00504         $result = $validateUtil->checkAll($how, $this->params[$method]);
00505         $this->set('__validateErrors', $result);
00506         return $result;
00507     }
00508 
00509     function validateModel($method, $modelname) {
00510         $method = $this->normalizeMethod($method);
00511 
00512         $modelname = strtolower($modelname);
00513         if (empty ($this->params[$method][$modelname])) {
00514             return array ();
00515         }
00516 
00517         $validateUtil = getUtil('Validate');
00518         $result = $validateUtil->checkAllWithModel($modelname, $this->params[$method][$modelname]);
00519         $this->set('__validateErrors', array (
00520             $modelname => $result
00521         ));
00522         return $result;
00523     }
